Hymn.English: 6 I will sing, yes, I will sing praises to the Lord

Hymn.Arabic: اسْتَمِعْ يَا رَبُّ صَوتِيَ الَّذِي بِهِ دَعَوْتُكَ.
Hymn.English: 7 Hear, O Lord, when I cry with my voice! Have mercy also upon me, and answer me.

Hymn.Arabic: ارْحَمْنِي وَاسْتَجِبْ لِي ، فَإِنَّ لَكَ قَالَ قَلْبِي هَلِلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 8 When You said, Seek My face, My heart said to You, Your face, Lord, I will seek.
